Methionyl growth hormone ( mGH ) show effect survival , disease progression muscular strength . MGH administer fix dose peripheral production IGF-I appear normal . We propose double-blind trial Growth Hormone ( GH ) add-on therapy Riluzole , individually regulate dose base peripheral response IGF-I .
